root.name: Dive: The Medes Islands Secret
root.description: OverviewDive uses the game engine from Over the Top Games' WiiWare hit NyxQuest. They also helped out Cosmonaut Games with development.In Dive, the player needs only the Wii Remote to guide the movement of John Sanders, the scuba diver looking for treasures of a lost civilization. John can find smaller treasures that can be exchanged for currency which is used to upgrade his gear. This can be used when returning to previously visited locations to dive even deeper on the hunt for more treasure.
